title: [娱乐][机制][汉化]PyroFishing — 趣味钓鱼.任务奖励+贩卖店+群系鱼种[1.9-1.12]
author: 梦江南
txt_content:
本帖最后由 panj 于 2017-9-16 12:00 编辑 


作者原话This is my first free plugin, I am still learning but I want to try bring as much fun to the Minecraft community by adding fun plugins that change base game mechanics. I originally made this as a Skript, however I am deciding to convert this over to Java and make it as customisation as possible for server owners to make it unique to their server!
Do you agree that fishing is boring? Then this is the plugin for you!
作者第一个免费插件

特点
自定义鱼 （配置文件自定义）配置文件方便添加自定义鱼5种不同类型的自定义鱼（不同类型不同价格）钓鱼菜单（指令：/fishing menu）任务奖励规则，分别是铜，银和金一个容易使用的鱼贩卖店，玩家可以把鱼卖给贩卖店！（不同鱼价格可以配置）亮点》》不同生物群系可以钓不同鱼（可配置）日常任务（可配置奖励）



图片展示本人汉化截图（汉化插件下面下载）

任务奖励规则


计划更新
更加真实的钓鱼，接近现实鱼的长度自定义（可以配置不同长度不同价格）鱼的重量自定义（可以配置不同重量不同价格）增加不同饵钓不同鱼钓鱼任务（可重复任务）增加可以编辑的消息文件
附加其他插件



指令 /fishing        (帮助菜单)
/fishing menu      (打开GUI)


权限 fishing.menu（打开GUI命令权限）》》》》  /fishing menu 
配置文件-下载

# 
#       5:    
#           Name: YourFishName  
#           Biomes: OCEAN, JUNGLE, BEACH, RIVER 生物群落：海洋、丛林、海滩、河
#           Description: This is my cool fish that I just created.
#    
BiomeFishingEnabled: false #生物群系开关
RawFishMoney: 50 #普通鱼价格
BronzeMoney: 100 #鱼类别价格（下面相同）
SilverMoney: 550
GoldMoney: 1500
DiamondMoney: 15000
PlatinumMoney: 35000
Fish:
  Bronze:   #鱼类别名称
    '1':    #编号
      Name: Tuna  #鱼名称
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH  #出现在哪个生物群系
      Description: Tuna? Who doesn't love tuna?  #描述
    '2':
      Name: Piranha
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Ouch! Watch out, it bites!
    '3':
      Name: Koi
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Want to make a pond for this one?
    '4':
      Name: Bass
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Someone turn that bass up!
  Silver:
    '1':
      Name: Eel
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Absoutely shocking.
    '2':
      Name: Manta Ray
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: It's ray! No that's a fish.
    '3':
      Name: White Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: I think this one is white?
    '4':
      Name: Mackeral
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Sardines anyone?
  Gold:
    '1':
      Name: Shark
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: JAWS!
    '2':
      Name: Angler Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Glows in the dark! Spooky!
    '3':
      Name: Viper Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: RUN!
    '4':
      Name: Tiger Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: What about a lion?
  Diamond:
    '1':
      Name: Pyro Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Hot to the touch! Careful!
    '2':
      Name: Altair
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: Assassins creed much?
    '3':
      Name: Purple Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: This fish loves purple!
    '4':
      Name: Sand Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: The fish is sandy!
  Platinum:
    '1':
      Name: Man o' War
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: It's a man, of, war.
    '2':
      Name: Rainbow Trout
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: It's a bird! No it's a rainbow!
    '3':
      Name: Morpher
      Biomes: RIVER, OCEAN
      Description: Believe it or not, it morphs.
    '4':
      Name: Skylar Fish
      Biomes: OCEAN, BEACH
      Description: The sky glows blue with this fish!
Quests:  #任务
  DailyQuest: #日常任务
    TimeTillReset: 23 #任务时间
    Fish:         #任务奖励级别
      Bronze: 3   #铜奖
      Silver: 1   #银奖
      Gold: 2     #金奖
    Rewards:     #任务完成奖励
      '1':       #对应上面的 Fish:
        Item: DIAMOND  #奖励物品名称
        Amount: 4      #奖励数量
      '2':
        Item: GOLD_INGOT
        Amount: 12
      '3':
        Item: EMERALD
        Amount: 6

replies.txt_content: 和morefish差不多
简直一模一样

replies.txt_content: 这GUI风格，好像dreamfish插件

replies.author: 可乐ColaTan
